snippet: Despite his sometimes gaudy statistics, the Los Angeles Lakers star is falling short of the most valuable player plateau.
abstract: Despite his sometimes gaudy statistics, the Los Angeles Lakers star is falling short of the most valuable player plateau.

headline.main: Keeping Score: Bryant Has the Stats Of a Not-Quite-M.V.P.
headline.print_headline: Keeping Score: Bryant Has the Stats Of a Not-Quite-M.V.P.
